attributes.action: make Business Improvement Districts accountable to the public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BID companies collect millions of tax-payers revenue and administer those taxes without public accountability. A party aggrieved by a BID company cannot complain to the OFT and cannot invoke the powers of the local authority ombudsman. BID companies do not have to publish their accounts. We the public demand for BID companies to be made more accountable to the public.
